prompts: Create a powerful rock-type Pokemon with a fierce expression and armored scales.
I want to see a dinosaur-like Pokemon that is both intimidating and rugged.
Generate a massive, green Pokemon that can easily blend into forest environments.
Make a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with sharp claws and a sturdy build.
Imagine a creature with a menacing roar and the ability to shake the ground beneath it.
Design a Pokemon whose presence commands respect in battle, with a unique body shape.
Show me an evolution of a smaller Pokemon that has transformed into a giant monster.
